  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball​(Point2D center, int radius, Color inner, Color border)
      Creating Ball Instance Maintenance - Additional radius parameter was changed and edited (radiusA, radiusB -> radius)
      Parameters:
      center - Initial position for the rubber ball in Point2D (Middle of the player panel)
      radius - Radius for the ball
      inner - Fill color for the ball
      border - Border color for the ball

    • reverseX

      public void reverseX()
      Setter function used when collection detected, reverse ball movement in X-axis Addition - when collision count to 10, reset the collision counter and increase speed in X-axis by 1

    • reverseY

      public void reverseY()
      Setter function used when collision detected, reverse ball movement in Y-axis Addition - when collision count to 10, reset the collision counter and increase speed in Y-axis by 1
